Valuable Aboriginal art collected by Dame Rosie and Michael Horton goes to Australian gallery after Auckland declined https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/valuable-aboriginal-art-collected-by-dame-rosie-and-michael-horton-goes-to-australian-gallery-after-auckland-declined/HHYFPOTW75C6PLGYEGEZQKROMA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/valuable-aboriginal-art-collected-by-dame-rosie-and-michael-horton-goes-to-australian-gallery-after-auckland-declined/HHYFPOTW75C6PLGYEGEZQKROMA/ Jane PhareA Sydney gallery has been gifted a multimillion-dollar Kiwi collection of Aboriginal art. Lawyer Jason Yang promised DJ lessons as payment, then tried to sue client at Disputes Tribunal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-jason-yang-promised-dj-lessons-as- payment-then-tried-to-sue-client-at-disputes-tribunal/F7KP2V54NNFVJG2QCC7WPSI3LA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-jason-yang-promised-dj-lessons-as- payment-then-tried-to-sue-client-at-disputes-tribunal/F7KP2V54NNFVJG2QCC7WPSI3LA/ Jeremy WilkinsonJason Yang forged invoices to hide his client from his employer before suing the DJ. Sun, 01 Sep 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Jason Yang has been suspended from practice for a year after the Lawyers and Conveyancers Disciplinary Tribunal found him guilty of misconduct.
